short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get Ip Address quickly. No trackers or ads, no strange permissions, open source code

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly access your IP address with this extension. No trackers or annoying ads to disrupt your online experience. We guarantee transparency and security by not requiring unnecessary permissions that could compromise your privacy. Additionally, the code is open to the public, so you can trust its integrity. Join a community committed to privacy and transparency while enjoying the convenience of knowing your IP address without worries or complications.
